TopicTitle: KSP 20 mins load screen 10 mins gameplay and crash

Articles.Content:
First of all I'm using ksp 64 bit (unofficial mod) The memory usage is about 5 gigs. Everything is normal the game is also vey smooth but when I revert a flight the game crashes. The load screen takes 20 minutes, the gameplay takes 10 minutes then crash !! it is more awful in 32 bit.

I've few quetions about it: 

1-) Why this happens because of a incompatible mod ? (I'm also using 64 bit unfixer)

2-) How can I detect the mod that causes crash ?

3-) When I start the game it stucks 2 or 3 times like in the picture below. And I must restart the game so I waste 1 hour with opening the game Is there a solution for this bug it also occurs in 32 bit.

4-) How can I make the load time quicker ? Because as I mentioned above I waste 20 mins for opening the game and after 10 mins it crashes. It is really annoying.

 

 

Edited March 24, 2016 by berkekrkn

2. Look at KSP.log and probably upload and ask for help if you don't figure out anything.

3. Sounds like the problem that my KSCLockup modlet is solving - try the link in my sig?
